member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE_ARM_STYLE
member.summary: The DWRITE_PANOSE_ARM_STYLE enumeration contains values that specify the style of termination of stems and rounded letterforms for text.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE_ARM_STYLE.DWRITE_PANOSE_ARM_STYLE_ANY
member.summary: Any arm style.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE_ARM_STYLE.DWRITE_PANOSE_ARM_STYLE_NO_FIT
member.summary: No fit arm style.

member.summary: The arm style is straight horizontal.

member.name: DWRITE_PANOSE_ARM_STYLE.DWRITE_PANOSE_ARM_STYLE_STRAIGHT_ARMS_VERTICAL
member.summary: The arm style is straight vertical.
